summary:
This small mod simply changes Saadia's face to make her more appealing, and also allows you to use her as a follower, or as a spouse.

In the screenshots I am using the CBBE body, and an ENB, so your Saadia may not look identical to this unless you install those mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/xbDPWdF.png[/img][/url][/center]

This small mod simply changes Saadia's face to make her more appealing, and also allows you to use her as a follower, or as a spouse. I think I've fixed the grey-face bug, but let me know if it persists. :D

In the screenshots I am using the CBBE body, and an ENB, so your Saadia may not look identical to this unless you install those mods.

There are two versions, one with, and one without, a scar on her face, with the Scarred Version existing for lore purposes.
author: SeanWinder97
